item.title: Project 3: Front end development: creation of a todo app using react
item.description: Front end web development. Deployed the front end of the app to github pages. Currently working on deploying the front and back end of the app using heroku. Link to website Link to Github repository

item.title: Project 1: Predicting Housing prices
item.description: Utilizing linear Regression, Random Forest Regression, Elastic Net Regression and Stochastic Gradient Descent on the data. Comparing the R2_score for different models to compare performance. Data obtained from kaggle. Link to Github repository

item.title: Project 2: Time series forecasting: Predicting facebook share prices
